channel.title: Lob on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Lob on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: First round of postcards
item.description: A first round of postcards sent via Lob.com have arrived or are nearly arrived at their destinations. The initial experience of sending them made it clear that I need to do some simple user interface improvements. I think I can cope with the current situation on producing the card back photo, but again there’s more work to be done making the text on the page wonderful. A reasonable question is, why do you send them?
